components.name: Layout
components.description: Root layout component with metadata, fonts and global styles

components.description: RTL-optimized navigation bar with the salon name and links to page sections

components.name: HeroSection
components.description: Bold, attention-grabbing hero section showcasing the salon's premium services

components.name: ServicesSection
components.description: Showcase of the salon's professional hair services with visual elements

components.name: AboutSection
components.description: Information about the salon's history, expertise and professional approach

components.name: BookingSection
components.description: Interactive booking form for salon appointments with service selection

components.name: TestimonialsSection
components.description: Customer reviews and success stories showcasing client satisfaction

components.name: GallerySection
components.description: Visual showcase of hairstyles and salon work to demonstrate expertise

components.name: FAQSection
components.description: Frequently asked questions about salon services, policies and procedures

components.name: TeamSection
components.description: Introduction to the salon's professional stylists and their specialties

components.name: ContactSection
components.description: Contact information, location map and quick contact form

components.name: Footer
components.description: Page footer with copyright, links and additional information
